## Checklist
- [ ] Typecheck/lint pass
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated

- [ ] No network calls introduced
- [ ] Cursor rules respected (Always)
- [ ] Max change set: 6 files or 300 LOC
- [ ] If touching calc formulas: unit tests prove no regression to Case A/B
